data.name: Super Impossible Road
data.detailed_description:
Now with Online Multiplayer!

Play the best players around the world! Up to 8 rivals can race each other worldwide. Vote for the next track location with the track spinner, or choose random or repeat track to liven things up.


About the Game

In the future, you’ve got to play a little dirty if you want to win races. Master hairpin turns across dangerous courses that twist and coil over beautiful galactic backdrops, knocking opponents into the void of space. Kick into hyperdrive with temporary speed boosts and use every opportunity to jump off the paths of the rollercoaster-like tracks. Bypass gates and checkpoints and roll over competitors on the way to first place!

The spiritual sequel to the award-winning Impossible Road is back and more ferocious than ever with all-new modes, 120 FPS local multiplayer, insane online play, and much more! So what’re you waiting for? Crack those knuckles and jump into the fastest, craziest, most spectacular racer you've ever played.

GAME FEATURES:

  • Race with your friends online no matter what console they have! Online cross-play is now available for Nintendo Switch, Xbox, PlayStation, and Apple Arcade.
  • Race online with up to 8 players at once
  • Race on a single PC with 4-player split-screen
  • Career mode
  • Single player modes with leaderboards
  • A new track globally every day in Daily Track mode
  • Full vehicle customization for boosting stats
  • Physically modeled material system with volumetric lighting and realtime reflections
  • Full surround sound system support
  • Procedural generation creates a new track every time
  • Techno soundtrack

data.short_description: Winning is Cheating in this futuristic racing game in which the only way to get ahead is by making your own shortcuts. Online 8-player, split screen 4-player, career mode, daily tracks and single player modes included.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Japanese, Korean, Russian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 650M or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 960 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10.11.x or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 650M or equivalent
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10.11.x or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 960 or equivalent
